*div1 type="summary"* *p*William Pettus to R. R. Royall and Austin, May 16, 1825.. Deed of trust to secure lien on slaves.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Sello 2° 12 rrs. Habilitado por la *location_mentioned*Nación Mexicano*/location_mentioned* pa. el año de *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Whereas *person_mentioned*William Pettus*/person_mentioned* formerly of the county of *location_mentioned*Lawrence */location_mentioned*and state of *location_mentioned*Alabama */location_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*United States of North America*/location_mentioned* and at present a *person_mentioned*setler */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Austins Settlement*/location_mentioned* in the department of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*State of Cuahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*United Mexican States*/location_mentioned* Heretofore to wit on the *date_mentioned n="03-06-1821">sixth day of March in the year 1821*/date_mentioned* executed to*person_mentioned* Thomas Bibb*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Daniel Coleman*/person_mentioned* a deed of Sale in Trust to certain *person_mentioned*Negroes */person_mentioned*therein named to secure the payment of certain monies which will also more fully appear on the face of said deed of Trust and the said *person_mentioned*William Pettus*/person_mentioned* being disposed to strengthen the security of Said money to *person_mentioned*Richard R Royall Attorney*/person_mentioned* in fact of the *person_mentioned*Trustee Daniel Coleman*/person_mentioned* have agreed to convey to *person_mentioned*R R Royall*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* the *location_mentioned*Lands */location_mentioned*herein after described in Trust and upon the conditions herein after expressed*/p*
*p*This Indenture made and entered into this *date_mentioned n="05-16-1825">16th day of may 1825*/date_mentioned* by and between the said *person_mentioned*William Pettus*/person_mentioned* of the first Part the said *person_mentioned*Richard R Royall*/person_mentioned* of the second Part and *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* of the third part. Therefore witnesseth that the said *person_mentioned*William Pettus*/person_mentioned* for and in the consideration of the premices and for the further consideration of one dollar to him in hand paid by the said *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin */person_mentioned*before the ensealing and delivering of these presents the receipt whereof he doth hereby acknowledge hath Granted bargained and sold and by these presents doth Grant Bargain and sell to the said *person_mentioned*R R Royall*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* the following *location_mentioned*tracts of land*/location_mentioned* the *location_mentioned*uper half of league of Land */location_mentioned*situated on the *location_mentioned*eastern Bank of the Brassos River*/location_mentioned*Bounded by *person_mentioned*William Hall*/person_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*uper side*/location_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Francis Bigum*/person_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*lower side*/location_mentioned* and also the *location_mentioned*uper half */location_mentioned*of a league of land on the *location_mentioned*Western Bank of the Colorado River*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Bounded on the uper side by */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Thomas Westall*/person_mentioned* Granted to said *person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned* by the *person_mentioned*Mexican Government*/person_mentioned* by the concession dated the *date_mentioned n="07-10-1824">10th of July 1824*/date_mentioned*—dividing each league so as the fronts on the river of each whole league shall be equally divided and runing thence in a Straight direction so as to divide the league equally to have and to hold the said Tracts of land to the said*person_mentioned* R R Royall*/person_mentioned* and the said *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* their *person_mentioned*heirs */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*administrators */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Executors */person_mentioned*in Trust nevertheless and upon the conditions following that is to say if said *person_mentioned*William Pettus*/person_mentioned* shall pay to said*person_mentioned* R R Royall*/person_mentioned* or in his absence to the *person_mentioned*Trustee Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* on or before the *date_mentioned n="11-15-1825">15th day of September 1826*/date_mentioned* forty Good merchantable mules of Reasonable age, of Good order for the Road and of a suitable size for the Plough and it is also understood said *person_mentioned*Royall*/person_mentioned* is not to receive such wild mules as are caught wild out of the *location_mentioned*Range */location_mentioned*and the said *person_mentioned*Royall */person_mentioned*agrees to accept said mules in discharge of fifteen Hundred dollars in discharge of part of said deed of sale upon Trust executed to *person_mentioned*Bibb*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Coleman */person_mentioned*and to give full and faithful credit upon the same. But If the said *person_mentioned*Pettus */person_mentioned*shall fail to make payment Punctually on or before the *date_mentioned n="11-15-1825">15th day of September 1825 */date_mentioned*delivering the said mules at *location_mentioned*San Felippe de Austin*/location_mentioned* then the said *location_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/location_mentioned* shall proceed to sell to the highest bidder in the Town of *location_mentioned*San Felippe de Austin*/location_mentioned* the said*location_mentioned* half leagues of land */location_mentioned*giveing fifteen days notice of said sale and the sale shall be for cash in hand which shall be immediately applyed to *person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned* credit on said Trust after deducting costs of sale and the said *person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned* hereby empowers said Austin to sell Deed and Put the *person_mentioned*Purchaser */person_mentioned*in Possession of said *location_mentioned*Lands */location_mentioned*without consulting said *person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned* thereon and said *person_mentioned*Royall */person_mentioned*agrees provided said *person_mentioned*Pettus */person_mentioned*shall punctually Pay said forty Mules of Quality etc as expressed to release from the Deed of Trust executed to *person_mentioned*Thomas Bibb*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Daniel Coleman*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Negroes Edmund*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Joe*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Anacy */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Mima */person_mentioned*but in no wise to lessen the effect and force of said deed of trust till said delivery of mules is punctually complyed with and then only to the four *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*above expressed and said deed to have full effect in all other relations expressed therein and also the note of hand which accompanys it and was its origin and all parties here present agree to accept of these presents in all its forms and said *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*agrees to execute the Trust hereby reposed in him to the best of his ability, and faithfully to pay over the money arising from the said sale of the Land should it be necessary after dediMing the expences of the sale in Testimony whereof the parties have hereunto set their hands and affixed their seals this ,*date_mentioned n="05-16-1825">16th day of may 1825*/date_mentioned* as above,*/p* *p*Witnesses Present*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm Pettus*/person_mentioned* [seal]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*R R Royall */person_mentioned* [seal]*/p* *p*aty in fact of *person_mentioned*Daniel Coleman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [seal]*/p*
*p*Witness*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Samuel M Williams*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Jno P Coles*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*To prevent all misunderstanding in relation to the meaning of the within deed of Trust it is clearly understood that the *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*deeded in the Trust is to be totally released from all lien whatever and reverts to said *person_mentioned*Pettus */person_mentioned*on the payment of the forty Mules punctually as stipulated and it is not the intent of this deed to give any other lien on the land except for this payment of the fifteen hundred dollars in case of a failure to pay the Mules as expressed but the *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*shall not be released as If the payment of the mules had been punctually made but both land and *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*be held subject, the land to this and the *person_mentioned*negroes */person_mentioned*to the old Trust executed to *person_mentioned*Bibb */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Coleman */person_mentioned*and all parties here present agree to accept of this with all the force and effect as If it had been incorporated in the body of the deed Given under our hands and seals the same day *date_mentioned n="05-16-1825">16th of May 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm. Pettus */person_mentioned* [seal]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*R R Royall*/person_mentioned* [seal]*/p* *p*Aty in fact of *person_mentioned*Daniel Coleman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* [seal]*/p* *p*Witnesses*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel M Williams*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Jno P. Coles*/person_mentioned**/p*
